title: Tech Trader: The State of the Memory Chip Market
description: Barron's associate editor for technology Eric Savitz and Micron Technology chief business officer Sumit Sadana discuss the outlook for the memory chip business, the ongoing component shortages and what's coming next in PCs, 5G and the cloud.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's associate editor for technology Eric Savitz and Micron Technology chief business officer Sumit Sadana discuss the outlook for the memory chip business, the ongoing component shortages and what's coming next in PCs, 5G and the cloud.
content:encoded: Barron's associate editor for technology Eric Savitz and Micron Technology chief business officer Sumit Sadana discuss the outlook for the memory chip business, the ongoing component shortages and what's coming next in PCs, 5G and the cloud.
